channel.title: RSS Feed of hoodie
channel.description: Hello :) I'm Hudi who developed gatsby-starter-hoodie theme.

item.title: ÌôîÏÉÅÏÉÅÎã¥ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌïú Janus Íµ¨ÏÑ±
item.description: ÌôîÏÉÅÏÉÅÎã¥ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌïú Janus Íµ¨ÏÑ± ÌôòÍ≤ΩÍµ¨ÏÑ± Ubuntu 18.04 bionic Python 3.7 ÏÑ§Ïπò Î™ÖÎ†πÏñ¥ Ï†ïÎ¶¨ ÌååÏù¥Ïç¨ Î∞è Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏÜåÌîÑÌä∏Ïõ®Ïñ¥ ÏÑ§Ïπò Janus ÏÑ§Ïπò How to install Janus Gateway in Ubuntu Server 1‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
ÌôîÏÉÅÏÉÅÎã¥ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌïú Janus Íµ¨ÏÑ±

üë®‚Äçüíª JanusÎ•º Ïö∞Î∂ÑÌà¨Ïóê ÏÑ§ÏπòÌïòÎ©¥ÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìïú Î™ÖÎ†πÏñ¥ Ï†ïÎ¶¨ Stun ÏÑúÎ≤ÑÏôÄ Turn ÏÑúÎ≤ÑÎ•º ÏúÑÌïú Coturn ServerÎèÑ Ìï®Íªò ÏÑ§Ïπò

ÌôòÍ≤ΩÍµ¨ÏÑ±

  • Ubuntu 18.04 bionic
  • Python 3.7

ÏÑ§Ïπò Î™ÖÎ†πÏñ¥ Ï†ïÎ¶¨

  1. ÌååÏù¥Ïç¨ Î∞è Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏÜåÌîÑÌä∏Ïõ®Ïñ¥ ÏÑ§Ïπò

  2. Janus ÏÑ§Ïπò

    How to install Janus Gateway in Ubuntu Server 18.04

    • Janus ÏÑ§Ïπò

      packagelist=( 
git 
libmicrohttpd-dev 
libjansson-dev 
libssl-dev 
libsrtp-dev 
libsofia-sip-ua-dev 
libglib2.0-dev 
libopus-dev 
libogg-dev 
libcurl4-openssl-dev 
liblua5.3-dev 
libconfig-dev 
pkg-config 
gengetopt 
libtool 
automake 
gtk-doc-tools 
cmake 
) 
apt-get install ${packagelist[@]}

    • libnice ÏÑ§Ïπò

      ‚Äª ÏµúÏÜå ÌååÏù¥Ïç¨ 3.7ÏùÑ ÏöîÍµ¨ÌïúÎã§. 

      pip3 install meson==0.61.5 
ln -s /usr/local/bin/meson /usr/bin/ 
wget https://github.com/ninja-build/ninja/releases/download/v1.10.1/ninja-linux.zip 
unzip ninja-linux.zip 
cp ninja /usr/bin/ 
git clone https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/libnice/libnice.git
cd libnice 
meson --prefix=/usr build 
ninja -C build 
ninja -C build install

    • libstrp ÏÑ§Ïπò

      wget https://github.com/cisco/libsrtp/archive/v2.2.0.tar.gz 
tar xfv v2.2.0.tar.gz 
cd libsrtp-2.2.0 
./configure ‚Äîprefix=/usr ‚Äîenable-openssl 
make shared_library && make install

    • usrctp ÏÑ§Ïπò

      git clone https://github.com/sctplab/usrsctp 
cd usrsctp 
./bootstrap 
./configure --prefix=/usr && make && make install

    • libwebsockets ÏÑ§Ïπò

      git clone https://github.com/warmcat/libwebsockets.git 
cd libwebsockets 
mkdir build 
cd build 
cmake -DLWS_MAX_SMP=1 -LWS_IPV6=ON -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=/usr -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS="-fpic" .. 
make && make install

    • mqtt ÏÑ§Ïπò

      git clone https://github.com/eclipse/paho.mqtt.c.git 
cd paho.mqtt.c 
prefix=/usr make install

    • NanoMSG ÏÑ§Ïπò

      apt-get install libnanomsg-dev -y

    • RabbitMQ C AMQP ÏÑ§Ïπò

      git clone https://github.com/alanxz/rabbitmq-c 
cd rabbitmq-c 
git submodule init 
git submodule update 
mkdir build && cd build 
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr ..
make && make install

    • janus Ïª¥ÌååÏùºÎßÅ

      git clone https://github.com/meetecho/janus-gateway.git
cd janus-gateway
sh autogen.sh
./configure ‚Äîprefix=/opt/janus
make && make install
make configs

  3. Janus ÏÑ§Ï†ï

    ÏÑ§Ï†ï ÌååÏùº ÏúÑÏπò : /opt/janus/etc/janus

    • janus.jcfg

      - log_to_file : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú 
- admin_secret : Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "PW" 
- rtp_port_range : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú Î∞è Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "20000-60000" 
- stun_server : Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "Stun Server Domain" 
- stun_port : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú 
- nat_1_1_mapping : Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "Server IP" 
- turn_server : Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "Turn Server Domain" 
- turn_port : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú 
- turn_type : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú 
- turn_user : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú Î∞è Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "Turn ID" 
- turn_pwd : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú Î∞è Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω " Turn PW" 
- ipv6 : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú Î∞è Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "true"

    • janus.plugin.videoroom.jcfg

      general{ 
admin_key : Ï£ºÏÑùÌï¥Ï†ú Î∞è Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "ÎπÑÎ∞ÄÎ≤àÌò∏" 
publishers : ÏÉùÏÑ± Í∞í "10" 
}

    • janus.transport.http.jcfg

      https : Í∞í Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "true" 
secure_port : Ï£ºÏÑù Ìï¥Ï†ú 
admin_https : Ï£ºÏÑùÏ≤òÎ¶¨ Í∞í Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "true" 
cert_pem : Í∞í Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "crt.pem ÏúÑÏπò" 
cert_key : Í∞í Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "key.pem ÏúÑÏπò" 
cert_pwd : Í∞í Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω "Ïù∏Ï¶ùÏÑú ÎπÑÎ∞ÄÎ≤àÌò∏"

  4. Coturn ÏÑ§Ïπò

item.title: ü§© 4. Other Tips
item.description: How to change the favicon? The favicon is located in . If you replace that image, the favicon will change. If you want to change the name of‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
How to change the favicon?

The favicon is located in static/favicon.png. If you replace that image, the favicon will change.

If you want to change the name of the favicon, change the icon property of gatsby-plugin-manifest in gatsby-config.js.

Utterance is not working properly.

In the http environment, utterance may not work properly. Host your blog with https.

How to set OG Image?

Replace the og-image.png file in the /static directory with your own image file.

Do you have another question?

Please comment on this article or open an issue in the gatsby-starter-hoodie repository. Your participation advances gatsby-starter-hoodie. Thank you üòé.

item.title: ü§î 3. Writing Guide
item.description: 1. Add a post You can add posts by creating a new markdown document in the path. 1-1. Post file structure There are two ways to add a new‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
1. Add a post

You can add posts by creating a new markdown document in the contents/post path.

1-1. Post file structure

There are two ways to add a new document. The first is to create a markdown file for a single document without a directory. If you are writing about JavaScript, you can create a about-javascript.md file in the contents/posts directory.

The second is to create a directory and create an index.md file in it. This method is useful when the document contains several additional files such as picture files.

Each file name or directory name becomes a unique address of the document and can be accessed as follows. https://siteURL/about-javascript.

1-2. Frontmatter

The Markdown document you create contains the document's metadata called frontmatter.

---
title: "ü§î 3. Writing Guide"
description: "How to write and add a post?"
date: 2021-05-03
update: 2021-05-03
tags:
  - hoodie
  - writing-guide
series: "Getting started your blog with gatsby-starter-hoodie"
---

Above is the frontmatter of the document you are currently reading. Among them, title and date are required. It is recommended to enclose the string with spaces in quotation marks.

1-3. Writing markdown

If you have written a Frontmatter, you can write your markdown document under it. gatsby-starter-hoodie supports most Markdown syntax. To learn more about Markdown syntax, see the Mastering Markdown documentation on GitHub.

2. Syntax Highlighting & Katex

2-1. Syntax Highlighting

Syntax highlighting based on Prism.JS is supported.

Examples

Javascript

console.log("Hello, world!")

Python

print("Hello, world!")

It supports a wider variety of other languages. Check it out on the Prism.js website.

2-2. Katex

It supports Katex syntax, you can easily express complex formulas.

Inline mode

E=mc2E = m c^{2}E=mc2

Block mode

‚à´0‚àûf(x)dx\int_{0}^{\infty} f(x) dx‚à´0‚àû‚Äãf(x)dx

3. Add images to a post

You can easily embed images using relative paths. It is easy to manage documents containing images by creating a directory.

Images are loaded with Lazy Loading, so you can secure fast document loading speed.

‚ö† The extension of the file must be set to lowercase.

4. Tagging

You can classify and search documents by tag set in Frontmatter. All tags you set can be viewed and searched in https://siteUrl/tags.

5. Series

You can publish multiple related documents in a series. The series set in Frontmatter is grouped together and shown at the top of the document. This can be useful for serialized documents with an order. Series documents are displayed in ascending order of creation date.

The current document is also set in a series called Getting started your blog with gatsby-starter-hoodie.

item.title: üöÄ 2. Quick Start
item.description: Getting started your blog with gatsby-starter-hoodie by following steps below. It's very easy üòâ. 1. Create a Gatsby site Make sure you have‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
Getting started your blog with gatsby-starter-hoodie by following steps below. It's very easy üòâ.

1. Create a Gatsby site

Make sure you have node.js and gatsby-cli installed on your computer.

$ npx gatsby new my-hoodie-blog https://github.com/devHudi/gatsby-starter-hoodie

2. Start dev server

$ cd my-hoodie-blog
$ npm run start

Now you can access to your blog at localhost:8000.

3. Create your own Github repository

Utterance comment widget is based on Github issue system. So you need your own GitHub repository. Also, if you want to publish your blog through Github Pages or Netlify, the Github Repository is a necessary.

If you don't know how to create a GitHub repository, follow the official GitHub documentation.

Add remote repository

$ git init
$ git remote add origin https://github.com/{YOUR_GITHUB_NAME}/{YOUR_REPOSITORY_NAME}

4. Write blog-config.js

module.exports = {
  title: "MY BLOG",
  description: "Hello, This is my blog",
  author: "YOUR NAME",
  siteUrl: "https://myblog.com",
  links: {
    github: "https://github.com",
    facebook: "https://www.facebook.com",
    instagram: "https://www.instagram.com",
    etc: "https://www.google.com/",
  },
  utterances: {
    repo: "{YOUR_GITHUB_NAME}/{YOUR_REPOSITORY_NAME}",
    type: "pathname",
  },
}

gatsby-starter-hoodie provides a configuration file called blog-config.js. In this file, you can configure blog, biography (profile), and utterance. The website settings you are currently viewing are as above.

Configure blog-config.js to suit your blog. However, it is recommended not to modify utterances.type.

Change profile image

Replace static/profile.png with the image you want. To change the image file name, you need to change the source code of src/components/Bio.jsx.

5. Add your content

Markdown content is in contents/posts. You can write and add your articles like the sample posts here. Click here to see the detail writing guide.

6. Deploy your blog

6-1 via Netlify

Follow the Connecting to Netlify steps in A Step-by-Step Guide: Gatsby on Netlify. It's not difficult.

If you connect the github repository using Netlify, it is automatically distributed whenever you push it, so it is convenient.

6-2. via Github Pages

Case 1

If the repository name is in the form of {YOUR_GITHUB_NAME} .github.io, run it below.

$ npm run deploy-gh

Case 2

If the repository name is not in the form of {YOUR_GITHUB_NAME} .github.io, run it below.

$ npm run deploy-gh-prefix-paths

In the above case, you need to change pathPrefix in gatsby-config.js to your repository name.

6-3. other platforms

$ npm run build

You can build the gatsby website with the command above. The build output is created in the /public directory. Deploy the /public directory using the command for the platform you want to deploy.

7. Cutomize

Project Structure

You can customize your own gatsby-starter-hoodie by referring to the following file structure üôä.

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ node_modules
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ contents
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ posts // your articles are here
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public // build outputs are here
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ src
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ assets
    ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ theme // theme config is here
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components
    ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Article
    ‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Body
    ‚îÇ           ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ StyledMarkdown
    ‚îÇ               ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ index.jsx // markdown styles are here
    ‚îÇ   ...
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ fonts // webfonts are here
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ hooks
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ images
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pages // page components are here
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ reducers
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ templates // post components are here
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ utils

item.title: üéá 1. About gatsby-starter-hoodie
item.description: About gatsby-starter-hoodie gatsby-starter-hoodie is a gatsby theme created for writing tech blogs. Markdown, Code Highlighting in various‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
About gatsby-starter-hoodie

gatsby-starter-hoodie is a gatsby theme created for writing tech blogs. Markdown, Code Highlighting in various programming languages, and Katex syntax are supported. Also, you can easily categorize articles into tags and series.

Start your blog with a neatly designed gatsby-starter-hoodie that supports dark mode.

Features

  • Markdown
  • Code Highlighting
  • Katex Syntax
  • Dark Mode (Responsive to the settings of the OS)
  • Tag Categoriazation
  • Series Categorization
  • Responsive Web
  • SEO
  • Utterance (Comment widget)

Let's get started

Follow the Quick Start

static/favicon.png Ïóê ÌååÎπÑÏΩò ÌååÏùºÏù¥ ÏúÑÏπòÌï¥ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ ÌååÏùºÏùÑ ÎåÄÏ≤¥ÌïòÎ©¥ ÌååÎπÑÏΩòÏùÑ Î≥ÄÍ≤ΩÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

ÎßåÏïΩ ÌååÎπÑÏΩò ÌååÏùºÏùò Ïù¥Î¶ÑÏùÑ Î≥ÄÍ≤ΩÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂Îã§Î©¥, gatsby-config.js ÌååÏùºÏùò gatsby-plugin-manifest ÏóêÏÑú icon ÏÜçÏÑ±ÏùÑ Î≥ÄÍ≤ΩÌïòÏÖîÏïºÌï©ÎãàÎã§.

OG Image Î•º ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂Ïñ¥Ïöî.

/static ÎîîÎ†âÌÜ†Î¶¨Ïùò og-image.png ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏù¥ ÏõêÌïòÎäî Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ ÌååÏùºÎ°ú ÎåÄÏ≤¥ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.

Îã§Î•∏ ÏßàÎ¨∏Ïù¥ ÏûàÏúºÏã†Í∞ÄÏöî?

Ïù¥ Î¨∏ÏÑúÏóê ÎåìÍ∏ÄÏùÑ Îã¨Í±∞ÎÇò gatsby-starter-hoodie Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨Ïóê Ïù¥ÏäàÎ•º Ïó¥Ïñ¥Ï£ºÏÑ∏Ïöî. Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Ï∞∏Ïó¨Í∞Ä gatsby-starter-hoodie Î•º ÎçîÏö± Î∞úÏ†ÑÏãúÌÇµÎãàÎã§. Í∞êÏÇ¨Ìï¥Ïöî üòé.

item.title: ü§î 3. ÏûëÏÑ± Í∞ÄÏù¥Îìú
item.description: 1. Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞ Í≤ΩÎ°úÏóê ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥ ÌååÏùºÏùÑ ÏÉùÏÑ±ÌïòÏó¨ Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Í∏ÄÏùÑ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. 1-‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
1. Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞

contents/post Í≤ΩÎ°úÏóê ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥ ÌååÏùºÏùÑ ÏÉùÏÑ±ÌïòÏó¨ Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Í∏ÄÏùÑ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

1-1. Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏ ÌååÏùº Íµ¨Ï°∞

ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏóêÎäî ÎëêÍ∞ÄÏßÄÍ∞Ä ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ï≤´Î≤àÏß∏Îäî ÎîîÎ†âÌÜ†Î¶¨ ÏóÜÏù¥ Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º ÏÉùÏÑ±ÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎßåÏïΩ Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏù¥ Javascript Ïóê Í¥ÄÌïú Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º ÏÉùÏÑ±ÌïúÎã§Î©¥, about-javascript.md ÌååÏùºÏùÑ contents/posts ÎîîÎ†âÌÜ†Î¶¨Ïóê Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

ÎëêÎ≤àÏß∏ Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÄ Î®ºÏ†Ä ÎîîÎ†âÌÜ†Î¶¨Î•º ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìïú Îí§, ÎîîÎ†âÌÜ†Î¶¨ ÏïàÏóê index.md ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÎäî Í≤É ÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÄ Î¨∏ÏÑú ÎÇ¥Ïóê Ïó¨Îü¨ Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ ÌååÏùº Îì± Î∂ÄÏàòÏ†ÅÏù∏ ÌååÏùº Ïó¨Îü¨Í∞úÍ∞Ä Ìè¨Ìï®ÎêòÏóàÏùÑ Îïå Ïú†Ïö©Ìï©ÎãàÎã§.

Ï≤´Î≤àÏß∏ Î∞©Î≤ïÏúºÎ°ú ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìïú ÌååÏùºÎ™ÖÏù¥ÎÇò, ÎëêÎ≤àÏß∏ Î∞©Î≤ïÏúºÎ°ú ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìïú ÎîîÎ†âÌÜ†Î¶¨ Ïù¥Î¶ÑÏùÄ ÏõπÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏ÏóêÏÑú Í≥†Ïú†Ïùò Ï£ºÏÜåÎ•º Í∞ñÏäµÎãàÎã§. https://siteURL/about-javascript ÏôÄ Í∞ôÏù¥Ïöî.

1-2. Frontmatter

ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥ÏùÄ Î¨∏ÏÑúÏùò Î©îÌÉÄÎç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Ïù∏ Frontmatter Îùº Î∂àÎ¶¨Îäî Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

---
title: "ü§î 3. ÏûëÏÑ± Í∞ÄÏù¥Îìú"
description: "Ïñ¥ÎñªÍ≤å Í∏ÄÏùÑ ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÍ≥† Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï†ÍπåÏöî?"
date: 2021-04-03
update: 2021-04-03
tags:
  - hoodie
  - writing-guide
series: "gatsby-starter-hoodie Î°ú Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ ÏãúÏûëÌïòÍ∏∞"
---

ÏúÑÎäî ÏßÄÍ∏à Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏù¥ ÏùΩÍ≥† ÏûàÎäî Î¨∏ÏÑúÏùò Frontmatter ÏûÖÎãàÎã§. title Í≥º date Îäî ÌïÑÏàò Í∞íÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎùÑÏñ¥Ïì∞Í∏∞Î•º Ìè¨Ìï®Îêú Î¨∏ÏûêÏó¥ÏùÑ ÏûÖÎ†•Ìï† ÎïåÏóêÎäî Îî∞Ïò¥ÌëúÎ°ú Í∞êÏã∏Îäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ Ï∂îÏ≤úÌï©ÎãàÎã§.

1-3. ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥ ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÍ∏∞

ÎßåÏïΩ Frontmatter ÍπåÏßÄ ÏûëÏÑ±ÌñàÎã§Î©¥, Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùÄ Í∑∏ ÏïÑÎûòÏóê ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥ Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÎ©¥ Îê©ÎãàÎã§. gatsby-starter-hoodie Îäî ÎåÄÎ∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùò ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥ Î¨∏Î≤ïÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥ ÏûëÏÑ± Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÑ ÏïåÍ≥† Ïã∂Îã§Î©¥, Github Ïùò Mastering Markdown Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º Ï∞∏Í≥†ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.

2. ÏΩîÎìú ÌïòÏù¥ÎùºÏù¥ÌåÖ & Katex

2-1. ÏΩîÎìú ÌïòÏù¥ÎùºÏù¥ÌåÖ

Prism.JS Ïóê Í∏∞Î∞òÌïú ÏΩîÎìú ÌïòÏù¥ÎùºÏù¥ÌåÖÏù¥ Ï†úÍ≥µÎê©ÎãàÎã§.

ÏòàÏãú

Javascript

console.log("Hello, world!")

Python

print("Hello, world!")

Í∑∏ Ïô∏ Îçî ÎßéÏùÄ Ïñ∏Ïñ¥Î•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ï†úÍ≥µÎêòÎäî Ïñ∏Ïñ¥Î•º ÌôïÏù∏ÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂Îã§Î©¥, Prism.js ÏõπÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏ Î•º Ï∞∏Í≥†ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.

2-2. Katex

Katex Î¨∏Î≤ïÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÏó¨ Î≥µÏû°Ìïú ÏàòÏãùÎèÑ ÏâΩÍ≤å ÌëúÌòÑÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

Ïù∏ÎùºÏù∏ Î™®Îìú

E=mc2E = m c^{2}E=mc2

Î∏îÎü≠ Î™®Îìú

‚à´0‚àûf(x)dx\int_{0}^{\infty} f(x) dx‚à´0‚àû‚Äãf(x)dx

3. Í∏ÄÏóê Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞

ÏÉÅÎåÄÍ≤ΩÎ°úÎ•º Ïù¥Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ ÏâΩÍ≤å Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄÎ•º Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎîîÎ†âÌÜ†Î¶¨Î•º ÏÉùÏÑ±ÌïòÍ≥† Í∑∏ ÏïàÏóê index.md Î•º Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÏó¨, Í∏ÄÏùÑ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏúºÎ°ú ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï¥Ïïº Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ Í¥ÄÎ¶¨Í∞Ä ÏâΩÏäµÎãàÎã§.

Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄÎäî Lazy Loading ÏúºÎ°ú Î°úÎìúÎêòÏñ¥, Îπ†Î•∏ Ï¥àÍ∏∞ Î¨∏ÏÑú Î°úÎî© ÏÜçÎèÑÎ•º ÌôïÎ≥¥Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

‚ö† Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄÏùò Î™®Îì† ÌôïÏû•ÏûêÎäî ÏÜåÎ¨∏ÏûêÏó¨ÏïºÌï©ÎãàÎã§.

4. ÌÉúÍ∑∏

Frontmatter Ïùò ÌÉúÍ∑∏Î•º ÌÜµÌï¥ ÏâΩÍ≤å Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º Î∂ÑÎ•òÌïòÍ≥† Í≤ÄÏÉâÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Î™®Îì† ÌÉúÍ∑∏Îäî https://siteUrl/tags Í≤ΩÎ°úÏóêÏÑú ÌôïÏù∏ÌïòÍ≥†, Í≤ÄÏÉâÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

5. ÏãúÎ¶¨Ï¶à

Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏù¥ Ïó∞Í¥ÄÎêú Ïó¨Îü¨Í∞úÏùò Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï† Îïå ÏãúÎ¶¨Ï¶àÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Frontmatter Ïóê ÏûëÏÑ±Îêú ÏãúÎ¶¨Ï¶àÍ∞Ä Í∞ôÏùÄ Î¨∏ÏÑúÎÅºÎ¶¨ Î¨∂Ïó¨ Î¨∏ÏÑú ÏÉÅÎã®Ïóê Î¶¨Ïä§Ìä∏Î°ú ÌëúÏãúÎê©ÎãàÎã§. ÏãúÎ¶¨Ï¶àÎäî ÏùºÎ†®Ïùò ÏàúÏÑúÍ∞Ä ÏûàÎäî Î¨∏ÏÑúÎì§ÏùÑ ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï† Îïå Ïú†Ïö©ÌïòÍ≤å ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏãúÎ¶¨Ï¶àÎäî Î¨∏ÏÑúÏùò ÏûëÏÑ± ÎÇ†Ïßú ÏàúÏÑúÎåÄÎ°ú Ï†ïÎ†¨Îê©ÎãàÎã§.

ÌòÑÏû¨ Î¨∏ÏÑúÎäî gatsby-starter-hoodie Î°ú Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ ÏãúÏûëÌïòÍ∏∞ ÎùºÎäî ÏãúÎ¶¨Ï¶àÎ°ú ÏÑ§Ï†ïÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

item.title: üöÄ 2. Îπ†Î•¥Í≤å ÏãúÏûëÌïòÍ∏∞
item.description: ÏïÑÎûò Îã®Í≥ÑÎ•º Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Î•º ÏãúÏûëÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. ÍµâÏû•Ìûà Ïâ¨ÏõåÏöî üòâ. 1. Gatsby ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏ ÏÉùÏÑ± Ïª¥Ìì®ÌÑ∞Ïóê node.js ÏôÄ gatsby-cli Í∞Ä ÏÑ§ÏπòÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÏñ¥ÏïºÌï©ÎãàÎã§. 2. Í∞úÎ∞ú ÏÑúÎ≤Ñ ÏãúÏûë Ïù¥Ï†ú localhost:800‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
ÏïÑÎûò Îã®Í≥ÑÎ•º Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Î•º ÏãúÏûëÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. ÍµâÏû•Ìûà Ïâ¨ÏõåÏöî üòâ.

1. Gatsby ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏ ÏÉùÏÑ±

Ïª¥Ìì®ÌÑ∞Ïóê node.js ÏôÄ gatsby-cli Í∞Ä ÏÑ§ÏπòÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÏñ¥ÏïºÌï©ÎãàÎã§.

$ npx gatsby new my-hoodie-blog https://github.com/devHudi/gatsby-starter-hoodie

2. Í∞úÎ∞ú ÏÑúÎ≤Ñ ÏãúÏûë

$ cd my-hoodie-blog
$ npm run start

Ïù¥Ï†ú localhost:8000 ÏúºÎ°ú Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Î•º Ï†ëÏÜçÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

3. Github Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨ ÏÉùÏÑ±

Utterance ÎåìÍ∏Ä ÏúÑÏ†ØÏùÄ Github Ïù¥Ïäà ÏãúÏä§ÌÖú Í∏∞Î∞òÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú Í∞Å Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ Î≥Ñ Github Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨Í∞Ä ÌïÑÏöîÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏù¥ Github Pages ÌòπÏùÄ Netlify Î°ú Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Î•º Î∞∞Ìè¨ÌïòÍ∏∏ ÏõêÌïúÎã§Î©¥, Github Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨Îäî ÌïÑÏàòÏûÖÎãàÎã§.

ÎßåÏïΩ Github Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨Î•º ÏÉùÏÑ±ÌïòÎäî Î≤ïÏùÑ Î™®Î•∏Îã§Î©¥, Github Í≥µÏãù Î¨∏ÏÑú Î•º Ï∞∏Ï°∞ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.

ÏõêÍ≤© Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨ Îì±Î°ù

git remote add origin https://github.com/{YOUR_GITHUB_NAME}/{YOUR_REPOSITORY_NAME}

4. blog-config.js ÏûëÏÑ±

module.exports = {
  title: "MY BLOG",
  description: "Hello, This is my blog",
  author: "YOUR NAME",
  siteUrl: "https://myblog.com",
  links: {
    github: "https://github.com",
    facebook: "https://www.facebook.com",
    instagram: "https://www.instagram.com",
    etc: "https://www.google.com/",
  },
  utterances: {
    repo: "{YOUR_GITHUB_NAME}/{YOUR_REPOSITORY_NAME}",
    type: "pathname",
  },
}

gatsby-starter-hoodie Îäî blog-config.js ÎùºÎäî ÏÑ§Ï†ï ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ ÌååÏùºÏóêÏÑú Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ Ï†ïÎ≥¥, ÏûëÏÑ±Ïûê ÌîÑÎ°úÌïÑ, Utterance ÏÑ§Ï†ï Îì±ÏùÑ ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂Ñ Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏóê ÎßûÍ≤å blog-config.js Î•º ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, utterances.type ÏÜçÏÑ±ÏùÄ ÏàòÏ†ïÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ Í∂åÏû•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§.

ÌîÑÎ°úÌïÑ Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ Î≥ÄÍ≤Ω

static/profile.png Ïóê ÏúÑÏπòÌïú Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ ÌååÏùºÏùÑ ÏõêÌïòÎäî Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ ÌååÏùºÎ°ú ÍµêÏ≤¥ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. ÎßåÏïΩ ÌååÏùºÎ™ÖÏùÑ Î≥ÄÍ≤ΩÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂Îã§Î©¥, src/components/Bio.jsx Ïùò ÏÜåÏä§ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º ÏàòÏ†ïÌï¥ÏïºÌï©ÎãàÎã§.

5. Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä

ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥ Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏Îäî contents/posts Í≤ΩÎ°úÏóê ÏúÑÏπòÌï¥ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ìï¥Îãπ Í≤ΩÎ°úÏóêÏÑú Í∏ÄÏùÑ ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïó¨Í∏∞Î•º ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ Îçî ÏûêÏÑ∏Ìïú Í∏Ä ÏûëÏÑ± Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÑ ÌôïÏù∏ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.

6. Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ Î∞∞Ìè¨ÌïòÍ∏∞

6-1 Netlify Î•º ÌÜµÌï¥

A Step-by-Step Guide: Gatsby on Netlify Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º Ï∞∏Ï°∞ÌïòÏó¨, Netlify Î•º Github Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨ÏôÄ Ïó∞Í≤∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ Í≥ºÏ†ïÏùÄ Ïñ¥Î†µÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§.

Github Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨ÏôÄ Ïó∞Í≤∞Ïù¥ ÎêòÏóàÎã§Î©¥, Github Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨Ïóê Î≥ÄÍ≤ΩÏÇ¨Ìï≠Ïù¥ Î∞úÏÉùÌï† Îïå ÎßàÎã§ ÏûêÎèôÏúºÎ°ú Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê Î∞∞Ìè¨Îê©ÎãàÎã§.

6-2. Github Pages Î•º ÌÜµÌï¥

ÏÉÅÌô© 1

Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨ Ïù¥Î¶ÑÏù¥ {YOUR_GITHUB_NAME}.github.io ÌòïÌÉúÏùº Í≤ΩÏö∞, ÏïÑÎûò Î™ÖÎ†πÏñ¥Î•º Ïã§ÌñâÌï¥Ï£ºÏÑ∏Ïöî.

$ npm run deploy-gh

ÏÉÅÌô© 2

Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨ Ïù¥Î¶ÑÏù¥ {YOUR_GITHUB_NAME}.github.io ÌòïÌÉúÍ∞Ä ÏïÑÎãê Í≤ΩÏö∞, ÏïÑÎûò Î™ÖÎ†πÏñ¥Î•º Ïã§ÌñâÌï¥Ï£ºÏÑ∏Ïöî.

$ npm run deploy-gh-prefix-paths

ÎßåÏïΩ ÏúÑÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ Í≤ΩÏö∞ gatsby-config.js ÏóêÏÑú pathPrefix Î•º Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Î†àÌè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨ Ïù¥Î¶ÑÏúºÎ°ú Î∞îÍøîÏïºÌï©ÎãàÎã§.

6-3. Îã§Î•∏ ÌîåÎû´Ìèº

$ npm run build

ÏúÑ Î™ÖÎ†πÏñ¥Î°ú Gastby ÏõπÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏Î•º ÎπåÎìúÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎπåÎìú Í≤∞Í≥ºÎ¨ºÏùÄ /public Ïóê Ï†ÄÏû•Îê©ÎãàÎã§. /public ÎîîÎ†âÌÜ†Î¶¨Î•º Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏù¥ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäî ÌîåÎû´ÌèºÏùò Î∞∞Ìè¨ Î™ÖÎ†πÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ Î∞∞Ìè¨Ìï¥Ï£ºÏÑ∏Ïöî.

7. Ïª§Ïä§ÌÑ∞ÎßàÏù¥Ïßï

ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏ Íµ¨Ï°∞

ÏïÑÎûò ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏ Íµ¨Ï°∞Î•º Ï∞∏Í≥†ÌïòÏó¨ Ïª§Ïä§ÌÑ∞ÎßàÏù¥Ïßï Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§ üôä.

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ node_modules
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ contents
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ posts // your articles are here
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public // build outputs are here

item.title: üéá 1. gatsby-starter-hoodie Ïóê ÎåÄÌïòÏó¨
item.description: gatsby-starter-hoodie Ïóê ÎåÄÌïòÏó¨ gatsby-starter-hoodie Îäî Í∏∞Ïà† Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Î•º ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Í∞úÎ∞úÎêú Gatsby ÌÖåÎßàÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥Í≥º ÎßéÏùÄ ÌîÑÎ°úÍ∑∏ÎûòÎ∞ç Ïñ∏Ïñ¥Ïùò ÏΩîÎìú ÌïòÏù¥ÎùºÏù¥ÌåÖ, Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥† Katex‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
gatsby-starter-hoodie Ïóê ÎåÄÌïòÏó¨

gatsby-starter-hoodie Îäî Í∏∞Ïà† Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Î•º ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Í∞úÎ∞úÎêú Gatsby ÌÖåÎßàÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥Í≥º ÎßéÏùÄ ÌîÑÎ°úÍ∑∏ÎûòÎ∞ç Ïñ∏Ïñ¥Ïùò ÏΩîÎìú ÌïòÏù¥ÎùºÏù¥ÌåÖ, Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥† Katex Î¨∏Î≤ïÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú ÌÉúÍ∑∏ÏôÄ ÏãúÎ¶¨Ï¶àÎ•º ÌÜµÌïòÏó¨ ÏâΩÍ≤å Í≤åÏãúÎ¨ºÏùÑ Î∂ÑÎ•òÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.

Îã§ÌÅ¨Î™®ÎìúÎ•º ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÎäî ÍπîÎÅîÌïú ÎîîÏûêÏù∏Ïùò gatsby-starter-hoodie Î°ú Ïó¨Îü¨Î∂ÑÏùò Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Î•º ÏãúÏûëÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.

Ï£ºÏöî Í∏∞Îä•

  • ÎßàÌÅ¨Îã§Ïö¥
  • ÏΩîÎìú ÌïòÏù¥ÎùºÏù¥ÌåÖ
  • Katex Î¨∏Î≤ï
  • Îã§ÌÅ¨Î™®Îìú (OS ÌôòÍ≤ΩÏÑ§Ï†ïÍ≥º Ïó∞Îèô)
  • ÌÉúÍ∑∏ Î∂ÑÎ•ò
  • ÏãúÎ¶¨Ï¶à Î∂ÑÎ•ò
  • Î∞òÏùëÌòï Ïõπ
  • SEO
  • Utterance (ÎåìÍ∏Ä ÏúÑÏ†Ø)

ÏãúÏûë

Îπ†Î•¥Í≤å ÏãúÏûëÌïòÍ∏∞ Î¨∏ÏÑúÏóêÏÑú Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Î•º ÏÑ∏ÌåÖÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.
